setting.name: Persistent_LibMinimap_HideMinimap
setting.description: Enable minimap

setting.name: Persistent_LibMinimap_RenderSmoothness
setting.description: Minimap smoothness level

setting.name: Persistent_LibMinimap_ZoomSegments
setting.description: Size of the area shown on the minimap

setting.name: Persistent_LibMinimap_HidePlayers
setting.description: Show other player markers on the minimap

setting.name: Persistent_LibMinimap_HideNames
setting.description: Show names under player markers

setting.name: Persistent_LibMinimap_HideCones
setting.description: Show direction other players are looking in

setting.name: Persistent_LibMinimap_HideImage
setting.description: Display map image on the minimap

setting.name: Persistent_LibMinimap_HideHeight
setting.description: Show players height difference as arrows on markers

setting.name: Persistent_LibMinimap_DisableRotation
setting.description: Rotate minimap with the player

setting.name: Persistent_LibMinimap_DisableUGView
setting.description: Switch to underground mode when in tunnels

setting.name: Persistent_LibInterfancy_UseCustomCrosshair
setting.description: Enable improved, custom crosshair

setting.name: Persistent_LibInterfancy_HideCrosshairNotes
setting.description: Show status messages under the crosshair

setting.name: Persistent_LibInterfancy_HideCrosshairGauge
setting.description: Show ammunition loading gauge around crosshair

setting.name: Persistent_LibInterfancy_UseLegacyGauges
setting.description: Use improved, clean gauges

setting.name: Persistent_LibInterfancy_AlwaysShowStamina
setting.description: Hide stamina bar when full

setting.name: Persistent_LibInterfancy_ShowGaugesBgs
setting.description: Draw backgrounds of the gauges

setting.name: Persistent_LibInterfancy_DisableCountdownSong
setting.description: Play special countdown soundtrack

setting.name: Persistent_LibStreaks_DisableStreaks
setting.description: Show streaks while playing (multikills)

setting.name: Persistent_LibChat_EnableEmojiParser
setting.description: Chat: show emojis in chat messages

setting.name: Persistent_LibTopScores_ShowMatchScores
setting.description: Top scores: always show rankings of the entire match

setting.name: Persistent_LibPauseMenu_HideMapInfo
setting.description: Show information about the current map in the pause menu

setting.name: Persistent_Jailbreak_UseOldIcons
setting.description: Jailbreak: Show players as classic icons instead using gauge

setting.name: Persistent_SpeedBall_CarrierInfoCorner
setting.description: SpeedBall: Show Ball carrier information in bottom right

setting.name: Persistent_GoldenDunk_HideBallHelpers
setting.description: Golden Dunk: Hide ball carrying indicators

binding.name: LibChat_TeamMessage
binding.description: Chat: start typing a team message
